results.title: Could simvastatin be considered as a potential therapy for chronic lung diseases? A debate on the pros and cons.
results.text_hl: Evidence could potentially be used to support the delivery of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ as inhaled formulation for the treatment of @DISEASE_Chronic_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012140 @@@respiratory diseases@@@.
